title: Build
description: Build settings for a Project Forge project

publish.description: if set, publishes this release to GitHub

changelog.description: if set, generates a changelog from commit comments

testsFail.description: if set, build will fail if tests fail

noScript.description: if set, prevents JavaScript from being emitted or utilized

desktop.description: if set, generates a desktop application

notarize.description: if set, notarizes the iOS and macOS binaries with Apple

signing.description: if set, signs the results with PGP

skipDocker.description: if set, skips the Docker builds

android.description: if set, generates an Android application

iOS.description: if set, generates an iOS application

wasm.description: if set, generates an WASM binary

windowsARM.description: if set, generates ARM Windows binaries

linuxARM.description: if set, generates ARM Linux binaries

linuxMIPS.description: if set, generates MIPS Linux binaries

linuxOdd.description: if set, generates Linux binaries for weird architectures

homebrew.description: if set, publishes this project to Homebrew
